definitions.definition: A goat 's horn endlessly overflowing with fruit , flowers and grain ; or full of whatever its owner wanted: or, an image of a such a horn, either in two or three dimensions.
A hollow horn- or cone -shaped object, filled with edible or useful things.

examples: The store provided a veritable cornucopia of modern gadgets.

main_definition: ( Greek mythology ) A goat 's horn endlessly overflowing with fruit , flowers and grain ; or full of whatever its owner wanted: or, an image of a such a horn, either in two or three dimensions.
secondary_definitions: A hollow horn- or cone -shaped object, filled with edible or useful things.
